actives.name: Active - Consume:
actives.description: Consumes a charge to restore 100 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

actives.name: Active - Consume:
actives.description: Serves a scrumptious scoop to a nearby Poro, causing it to grow in size. This savory blend of free-range, grass-fed Avarosan game hens and organic, non-ZMO Freljordian herbs contains the essential nutrients necessary to keep your Poro purring with pleasure. All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty.

passives.description: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage, up to 8%. At maximum strength, gain Omnivamp.

passives.name: Void Infusion
passives.description: Gain 2% of your bonus Health as Ability Power.

passives.name: Soulrend:

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste. Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

passives.name: Squall

passives.name: Hackshorn

passives.name: Rapids
passives.description: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 45 Ability Power for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Starlit Grace
passives.description: Healing or shielding an ally chains the effect to another ally (excluding yourself), healing 30% or shielding 35% of the original amount.

passives.name: Soul Shard

passives.name: Soul Shards

passives.name: First Light
passives.description: Gain 2% Heal and Shield Power and 10 Ability Power per 100% Base Mana Regen.

passives.name: Big Hands
passives.description: Gain 0-30% Critical Strike Chance, scaling with your bonus Health.

passives.name: Supremacy
passives.description: Increases your Health, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, and Ability Haste by 20%, increased by 0% perTakedown and -3% per Death after acquiring this item.

passives.name: Immovable as the Earth
passives.description: Increase your armor by 20%, and gain Block Chance based on your Armor.

passives.name: Limitless as the Stars
passives.description: Increase your Magic Resist by 10%. Reduce all damage you take from non-Basic Attack sources by a percentage, scaling with your Magic Resist up to a cap of 25%.

passives.name: Excoriate
passives.description: Each Critical strike deals random bonus Critical Strike Damage, scaling up to 50% of your Critical Strike Chance.

passives.name: Cleave
passives.description: Attacks deal physical damage to nearby enemies.

actives.name: Breaking Shockwave
actives.description: Deal physical damage and Slow nearby enemies by 35%. Gain 35% decaying Move Speed per champion hit for 3 seconds.

actives.name: Lightning Bolt
actives.description: Shocks the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Like the Wind
passives.description: Gain 5% Move Speed On-Hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25% Move Speed. Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

actives.name: Unbreakable:
actives.description: Gain a Shield that decays and grow in size.

passives.name: Effervescence
passives.description: Gain +1% Attack Speed for every 1% Heal and Shield Power you have.

passives.name: Peppermint
passives.description: On-Hit, heal the lowest health ally champion near you for , prioritizing lower health allies.

passives.name: Safeguard
passives.description: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage by 40%. Safeguard persists for 3 seconds after taking champion damage. (0s). Item Cooldown is restarted when damage is taken from champions.

passives.name: Torment
passives.description: Damaging Abilities burn enemies for 2% max Health magic damage per second for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Suffering
passives.description: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage, up to 6%.

passives.name: Fire
passives.description: Damaging Abilities fire 6 Shots that deal bonus magic damage to the target and nearby enemies. Remaining Shots fire on the primary target, dealing 20% damage.

passives.name: Timeless
passives.description: This item gains 10 Health, 30 Mana and 3 Ability Power every 60 seconds up to 10 times. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level.

passives.name: Eternity
passives.description: Taking damage from champions restores 10% of the damage as Mana. Casting an ability heals for 25% of Mana spent.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.description: After taking or dealing damage, deal magic damage to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.description: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals bonus physical damage On-Hit and creates a frost field for 2s that Slows.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.description: After taking or dealing damage, deal magic damage per second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Desolate
passives.description: Killing an enemy deals magic damage around them.

passives.name: Voidborn Resilience
passives.description: After 5 seconds of champion combat, increase your bonus Armor and Magic Resist by 30% until end of combat.

passives.name: Playing for Time
passives.description: Killing enemies with the Gambler's Blade delays Doom-boss Veigar's arrival by an additional 5 seconds. Deaths while carrying the Blade accelerate it by 5 seconds.

passives.name: Watch Them Fall
passives.description: On Immobilize or Grounding an enemy champion, summon a comet above them. The comet lands after 1 second, dealing additional magic damage in the area. This effect has a 6s cooldown per target per spell cast.

passives.name: Hack the Meat
passives.description: Dealing damage shreds 3 Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Applying stacks has a 1 second cooldown per Ability.

passives.name: Cannibalize
passives.description: On Champion Takedown, Heal yourself and your ally for 18% of the Target's Max Health.

passives.name: Bring It Down
passives.description: Every third Attack deals bonus physical damage On-Hit, increased based on their missing Health.

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.description: Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% grants a Shield for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Transcendence
passives.description: Attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldown.

passives.name: Death
passives.description: Your damage executes champions that are below 5% Health.

passives.description: Champion kills grant 25 bonus gold.

passives.name: Ambush Predator:
passives.description: After entering a bush your next damaging Attack or Ability on enemy champions deals 10% of their current health over 4 seconds, revealing them and reducing their vision radius for the duration. (5(0s)).

passives.name: Bitter Cold
passives.description: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies below 50% Health by 30% for 1 second.

passives.name: Shield Reaver

passives.name: Shield Reaver
passives.description: , reduce Shields on them by %.

passives.name: Flux
passives.description: When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, refund some of your Ultimate Ability's total cooldown.

passives.name: Eminence
passives.description: When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain 15 Attack Damage plus 2 per champion killed for 90 seconds.

passives.name: Cleave
passives.description: Attacks deal physical damage to nearby enemies.

actives.name: Heretical Cleave
actives.description: Deal physical damage around you.

passives.name: Galvanize
passives.description: Dashes and Stealth stack Energized 75% faster.

passives.name: Firmament
passives.description: Your Energized Attack deals bonus physical damage and Slows for 0.75 seconds.

passives.name: Preparation
passives.description: After being out of combat with Champions for 8 seconds gain Lethality. This Lethality lasts for 3 seconds after dealing damage to champions.

passives.name: Extraction
passives.description: When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain 200 decaying Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.

passives.name: Vendetta
passives.description: You gain Vendetta stacks over time Each stack of Vendetta grants you 1% reduced damage from your Nemesis.

passives.name: Vengeance
passives.description: At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has reduced Tenacity while near you.

actives.name: Vow
actives.description: Choose a Nemesis.

passives.name: Vile Decay
